dcterms:description: This dataset consists of 28 videos lasting from 10 seconds to 1 minute in indoors or outdoors scenarios. 13 videos used for training and 15 for testing. Its frame size ranges from 720 x 480 to 1280 x 960.
dcterms:title: ICDAR 2013 Video

dcterms:creator: R. Minetto
N. Thome
M. Cord
N. J. Leite
J. Stolfi
dcterms:description: Minetto Dataset consists of 5 videos in outdoor scenes. The frame size is 640 x 480 and all videos are used for test.
dcterms:title: Minetto Dataset

dcterms:creator: P. X. Nguyen
K. Wang
S. Belongie
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 30 videos, 15 for training and 15 for testing. Different from the above 2 datasets, it contains web videos except for scene videos. The frame size is 1280 x 720.
dcterms:title: YVT
